header.title: How to Pay?
header.description: Make your payment via internet and mobile banking and enjoy automatic bill update with Dot Internet's automatic billing system.

paymentMethods.name: bKash
paymentMethods.title: Pay Bill through bKash
steps: Login to your bKash account with your PIN.
Select 'Pay Bill' option from the menu.
Enter your Customer ID and check the bill.
Confirm payment to complete the process.

paymentMethods.name: Upay
paymentMethods.title: Pay Bill through Upay
steps: Select 'Dot Internet' from the provider list.
Check amount and confirm with your PIN.

paymentMethods.name: Rocket
paymentMethods.title: Pay Bill through Rocket
steps: Dial *322# or login to Rocket App.
Enter Biller ID for Dot Internet (e.g. 1234).
Provide your Customer ID as Bill Number.
Enter Bill amount and your Secret PIN.
